Shri. R. P. S Kahlon: Shri R. P. S. Kahlon, Chairman, Kolkata Port Trust, an IAS officer of 1984
batch of West Bengal Cadre took over the additional charge of Chairman, Visakhapatnam Port
Before taking over the charge of Chairman, Kolkata Port Trust, Shri R. P. S. Kahlon was Principal
Secretary, Environment Department, Govt. of West Bengal (w.e.f. 30.05.2011 till 02.01.2013).
-+ As a member of Indian Administrative Service, Shri Kahlon has served the state of
West Bengal in various capacities. Shri Kahlon was Principal Secretary, Transport (w.e.f.
31.1.2011 to 30.05.2011), Department of Fisheries, (w.e.f. 2004 to 31.01.2011),
Department of Sports and Youth Services, Department of Fire Services, Disaster
Management Department (Additional Charge with Fisheries Department), Commissioner,
Health and Family Welfare, Department of Health (1999-2002), Labour Commissioner,
Labour Department, (2002-2004).
September, 2013.
